text: The Soul Sessions Vol. 2 is the sixth studio album by English singer- songwriter Joss Stone, released on 20 July 2012 by S-Curve Records and her own label, Stone'd Records. ==Background== Like her debut album The Soul Sessions (2003) where the songs were covers of classic soul songs, The Soul Sessions Vol. 2s songs are covers of soul and R&B; songs that were originally made during the 1970s. ==Reviews== The Soul Sessions Vol. 2 received positive reviews from music critics. ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2012) Peak position Argentine Albums Chart Note: Reader must define search parameters as "Ranking Semanal Pop" and "29/07/2012". 5 Australian Albums Chart 42 Australian Jazz & Blues Albums Chart 1 Austrian Albums Chart 6 Belgian Albums Chart (Flanders) 25 Belgian Albums Chart (Wallonia) 44 Canadian Albums Chart 23 Dutch Albums Chart 2 French Albums Chart 82 German Albums Chart 7 Italian Albums Chart 62 Scottish Albums Chart 24 South Korean International Albums Chart 35 Swiss Albums Chart 5 UK Albums Chart 6 UK R&B; Albums Chart 3 US Billboard 200 10 US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 3 ==References== Category:2012 albums Category:Joss Stone albums Category:Quiet storm albums Category:Soul albums Category:R&B; albums
title: The Soul Sessions Vol. 2
